mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.picture_type AS "pictureType", a.picture_type_name AS "pictureTypeName", a.picture_status AS "pictureStatus", a.picture_status_name AS "pictureStatusName", a.picture_name AS "pictureName", a.picture_url AS "pictureUrl", a.object_id AS "objectId", a.picture_frist AS "pictureFrist", a.create_preson AS "createPreson", a.update_preson AS "updatePreson", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.delete_flag AS "deleteFlag", a.order AS "order", a.title AS "title", a.describes AS "describes", a.origin_object_id AS "originObjectId", a.origin_picture_id AS "originPictureId"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ORDER BY a.id DESC

SELECT
FROM
ORDER BY a.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( id, picture_type, picture_type_name, picture_status, picture_status_name, picture_name, picture_url, object_id, picture_frist, create_preson, update_preson, create_date, update_date, delete_flag, order, title, describes, origin_object_id, origin_picture_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pictureType}, #{pictureTypeName}, #{pictureStatus}, #{pictureStatusName}, #{pictureName}, #{pictureUrl}, #{objectId}, #{pictureFrist}, #{createPreson}, #{updatePreson}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteFlag}, #{order}, #{title}, #{describes}, #{originObjectId}, #{originPictureId} )

INSERT INTO
picture_type, picture_type_name, picture_status, picture_status_name, picture_name, picture_url, object_id, picture_frist, create_preson, update_preson, create_date, update_date, delete_flag, order, title, describes, origin_object_id, origin_picture_id,
VALUES
#{pictureType}, #{pictureTypeName}, #{pictureStatus}, #{pictureStatusName}, #{pictureName}, #{pictureUrl}, #{objectId}, #{pictureFrist}, #{createPreson}, #{updatePreson}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteFlag}, #{order}, #{title}, #{describes}, #{originObjectId}, #{originPictureId},
mapper.update: UPDATE SET picture_type = #{pictureType}, picture_type_name = #{pictureTypeName}, picture_status = #{pictureStatus}, picture_status_name = #{pictureStatusName}, picture_name = #{pictureName}, picture_url = #{pictureUrl}, object_id = #{objectId}, picture_frist = #{pictureFrist}, create_preson = #{createPreson}, update_preson = #{updatePreson}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag}, order = #{order}, title = #{title}, describes = #{describes}, origin_object_id = #{originObjectId}, origin_picture_id = #{originPictureId}, WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.typegroupname, b.pictureUrl, b.count FROM house_group_type a LEFT JOIN ( select x.picture_status AS pictureStatus, x.picture_url AS pictureUrl, count(1) AS count from (SELECT * FROM dsj_new_house_picture_auth_history WHERE object_id = #{newHouseId} and delete_flag = #{deleteFlag} ORDER BY picture_frist) x GROUP BY x.picture_status
) b ON a.id = b.pictureStatus WHERE a.parent_id = #{parentId}

SELECT a.id, a.describes as describes, a.picture_frist as pictureFrist, a.picture_url as pictureUrl, a.create_date as createTime, b.realname as realname FROM left join dsj_user b on a.create_preson=b.id
ORDER BY a.id DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ( picture_type, picture_type_name, picture_status, picture_status_name, picture_name, picture_url, object_id, picture_frist, create_preson, update_preson, create_date, update_date, delete_flag, title, describes, origin_object_id, origin_picture_id ) VALUES
( #{item.pictureType}, #{item.pictureTypeName}, #{item.pictureStatus}, #{item.pictureStatusName}, #{item.pictureName}, #{item.pictureUrl}, #{newHouseAuthHistoryId}, #{item.pictureFrist}, #{item.createPreson}, #{item.updatePreson}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updateDate}, 2, #{itemã€‚title}, #{item.describes}, #{item.originObjectId}, #{item.originPictureId} )
